body.p: A column in a template.XULElem("listbox"). You can make some columns flexible and other columns non-flexible.
body.pre: <!-- A two column listbox with one column flexible --> <listbox> <listhead> <listheader label="First"/> <listheader label="Last"/> </listhead> <listcols> <listcol flex="1"/> <listcol/> </listcols> <listitem> <listcell label="Buck"/> <listcell label="Rogers"/> </listitem> <listitem> <listcell label="John"/> <listcell label="Painter"/> </listitem> </listbox>

dl.dd: template.XULElem("listbox"), template.XULElem("listcell"), template.XULElem("listcols"), template.XULElem("listhead"), template.XULElem("listheader"), template.XULElem("listitem")
